name: Avoid having control structures without proper spacing in the open and close brace - PSR2 (PHP)
description:
This rule reports all PHP Sections having control structures without proper spacing in the open and close brace.
This QR provides the following information:
PHP Section full name."

This rule is based on Code Sniffer 2.5.0
